txt.en: High in the tower of Bekar-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad prepare for war. Among them, Ushgoth the Mighty makes ready to enact his plans on the battlefield….\n\nYour mission is to defeat Ushgoth the Mighty, the captain of the Orcs in Bekâr-zarakh.
Feared by Orcs and dwarves alike, Ushgoth the Mighty leads the forces of Gundabad who dwell in Bekâr-zarakh.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin for your reward.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have just returned with urgent news. One of Gorgar's most trusted lieutenants, Ushgoth the Mighty, has been granted command of the Orcs in Bekâr-zarakh. With many of them still patrolling Elderslade, now is our chance to deal a blow to Gorgar himself!

'You are to travel to Bekâr-zarakh and see that Ushgoth is defeated. Let the Orcs of Gundabad tremble in fear! For the Zhélruka! For the Gabil'akkâ!'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt a brutal wounding attack.
Your mission is to defeat Ushgoth the Mighty, the captain of the Orcs in Bekâr-zarakh.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin and travel to Bekâr-zarakh.
'Well done, [placeholder]!\n\n'It seems Ushgoth wasn't so mighty after all, eh?'
